p: Data from a phase 3 randomized controlled trial of anakinra (Kineret TM) in sepsis, showed significant increase in survival in patients with hyperinflammation, without increased adverse events [24]. Currently, Swedish Orphan Biovitrum has an open-label, multicenter clinical trial evaluating the use of anakinra in combination with emapalumab at reducing hyperinflammation in severe COVID-19 patients. Patients in the anakinra arm, will receive anakinra intravenous (IV) infusion four times daily for 15 days (400 mg/day, divided in four daily doses).
